name: add_succ
statement: theorem add_succ (n m : Nat) : n + succ m = succ (n + m)

name: add_comm
statement: theorem add_comm (n m : Nat) : n + m = m + n

name: add_assoc
statement: theorem add_assoc (n m p : Nat) : (n + m) + p = n + (m + p)

name: mul_succ
statement: theorem mul_succ (n m : Nat) : n * succ m = n * m + n

name: mul_comm
statement: theorem mul_comm (n m : Nat) : n * m = m * n

name: mul_distrib
statement: theorem mul_distrib (n m p : Nat) : n * (m + p) = n * m + n * p
